file_content.text: You've done a lot for Organa. Thank you.
If more bombs go off, we're all dead.
Master Jedi! Please, I have an urgent call from Organa palace.
Excuse me! Please, I have an urgent call from Organa palace.
Stay calm. Tell me what's going on.
Slow down and breathe.
I'm only the messenger. You'll have to talk to him.
What do you have for me?
Go ahead.
Putting the call through right now.
I don't remember telling anyone I'd be here.
How'd you know I was coming?
They saw your ship on the scanners. Here....
Salutations, Jedi. General Kashim of the Republic Armed Forces.
The Republic and House Organa require emergency assistance. Please report on your status and capabilities.
I'm here at the bidding of the Jedi Council. What do you need?
I'm ready to serve.
Salutations, Lieutenant. General Kashim of the Republic Armed Forces.
The Republic and House Organa require emergency assistance. Please report on Havoc Squad's status.
Havoc Squad is prepped and armed, sir. What's the mission?
We're ready for action.
Havoc Squad reports to Special Forces, sir. Our status is classified.
You're not my commander.
Salutations. I am General Kashim of the Republic Armed Forces.
The Republic and House Organa require emergency assistance, and your vessel indicates combat readiness. Please acknowledge.
I've got guns and a hell of a ship. Tell me what you need.
Sounds like you need help.
Slow down a minute....
I'm just a visitor here, General. Not part of your operation.
Are you drafting me?
This is an emergency--I may have no authority, but there is moral necessity.
The Republic is allied with House Organa and pledged to its defense.
Our forces have repelled an attack by the enemy House Thul and its Imperial backers. But our foe is now employing a scorched world tactic.
You can explain it all later. Where do you want me?
How can I help?
I don't understand. What are these houses?
House Organa? House Thul?
Alderaanian nobility. There is no time for history now!
So, you're desperate and have a lot of money. I like where this is going.
I smell credits.
I do not like working with mercenaries. But I will do what I must.
Tragic, but not my problem.
The enemy Thul battle squads and their Imperial droids are laying high-yield baradium explosives in your area.
One baradium bomb could level a mountain. A dozen could--
You've got to stop the Thul squads before they turn this place into a crater!
I can stop them. Can you tell me any more?
Point me on the way.
I saw some of the Thul soldiers on my way here. I don't know anything else--don't let them blow us up!
I'm not going anywhere until someone fills me in.
Tell me what's going on!
I don't--House Thul wants to get rid of House Organa and the Republic. And they're about to win if you don't do something.
Well, this isn't good.
They've got guns and droids outside. You have to stop the bombs....
Excuse me, but I'm needed by my lord duke.
